originalText.text: I have known Dr Bello and have  been his patient for over 32 years. He first started to treat me as a young college student and after I moved to Greece  I would always come for check ups on my visits back to NYC . He is a wonderful , kind , compassionate family man with a great sense of humor and extensive medical expertise . He has always patiently and knowledgeably provided me with all the answers to my questions and medical issues . A kinder more caring  doctor you will never find ! 100 star ⭐️ rating !!!

originalText.text: Dr. Bello was one of many doctors that worked with me and my husband to figure out why we were not conceiving.  Not only did he help try to find a physical answer, he also spoke with us about the emotional aspects that may have been holding us back.  Doctors don’t normally take the time to counsel couples, and his patience and understanding made an impact on both my husband and me.  What’s more, I prefer holistic methods of treatment.  There are very few doctors I’ve spoken to throughout the years that have the knowledge of other aspects of healing, but Dr. Bello was able to not only follow along with explanations of my preferences but also was able to answer my questions.  My husband and I are now happy parents of a 3 week old healthy baby boy.  Dr. Bello will always hold a special place in our hearts.  We couldn’t be more grateful for his patience, kindheartedness, genuine interest and care, and for his expertise.

originalText.text: Worst uncaring doctor I have ever met. He thinks he knows everything and likes to make you feel like your issues are not real. I would never recommend anyone to him and if anyone had a positive experience with him its more than likely you are not a minority and I’m going to leave it like that!
